name: Soaring Hearts
description:
In 'Soaring Hearts', you play as best friends Hardy and Fuzzy as they attempt to climb the mountain to make their flightless lives a bit more free. Their eyes may be too small to see the view from the summit, but at the end of the day, it's all about the journey, not the destination.

This is a 2 player game, so make sure to enjoy it as such!

Player 1 Controls:

A / D - Left / Right

W - Jump

S - Grab / Release

Player 2 Controls:

Left Arrow / Right Arrow - Left / Right

Up Arrow - Jump

Down Arrow- Grab / Release
